scenes.title: The Monolith Problem
scenes.visual_description: Large cube labeled MONOLITH containing auth, payment, database, API icons trapped inside. Cube begins to crack.
scenes.voiceover: What if your entire application was one giant block… and one tiny bug could bring everything down?

scenes.title: How Monoliths Work
scenes.visual_description: Single large server box with tightly connected internal modules using tangled lines. A bug icon drops in and system flashes red.
scenes.voiceover: In a monolith, everything runs together. If one part fails, the entire system can collapse.

scenes.title: Introducing Microservices
scenes.visual_description: Monolith explodes into multiple small colorful service boxes labeled Auth, Payment, Notification, User. They connect with animated API lines.
scenes.voiceover: Microservices break applications into small, independent services that communicate over APIs.

scenes.title: Resilience
scenes.visual_description: Payment service turns red and crashes while other services remain green. A repair robot fixes the crashed service.
scenes.voiceover: If one service fails, others continue running. That means better resilience.

scenes.title: Independent Scaling
scenes.visual_description: User traffic icons increase. Payment service clones into multiple instances while others remain unchanged.
scenes.voiceover: Need more power? Scale only the services that need it.

scenes.title: Technology Freedom
scenes.visual_description: Each service displays a different abstract tech icon. Despite differences, they connect smoothly via APIs.
scenes.voiceover: Each service can use different technologies — as long as they speak the same language through APIs.

scenes.title: Trade-offs
scenes.visual_description: Network lines multiply. Architecture becomes more complex. Monitoring dashboard appears.
scenes.voiceover: But microservices introduce complexity — networking, monitoring, deployment, and coordination.

scenes.title: Final Summary
scenes.visual_description: Clean organized microservice architecture glowing softly. Slight orbiting camera motion.
scenes.voiceover: Microservices trade simplicity for scalability and resilience. They power modern platforms — from startups to global tech giants.
